com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation

Class SVAnimationSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation.SVAnimation
      • com.samsung.android.sdk.visualview.animation.SVAnimationSet

  • public class SVAnimationSet
extends SVAnimation
    This class provides the functionality for creating composite animations by allowing different types of animations to be combined including other SviAnimationSets. Multiple animations created for the same slide must belong to same animation set

    • Method Detail

      • addAnimation

        public boolean addAnimation(SVAnimation animation)
        Add the specified animation to the animation set.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation to add to the set.
        Returns:
        true if animation is added successfully, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the input animation object is passed as null.

      • removeAnimation

        public void removeAnimation(SVAnimation animation)
        Remove the specified animation from the animation set.
        Parameters:
        animation - The animation to remove from the set.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the input animation object is passed as null.

      • setInterpolator

        public void setInterpolator(int interpolator)
        Set the specified interpolator for the animation.
        Overrides:
        setInterpolator in class SVAnimation
        Parameters:
        interpolator - - Interpolator used by the animation, see the list of interpolators in the SV class for more information. The value should lie between 0~41
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - The interpolator type must lie between 0 ~41 , any value outside the range throws IllegalArgumentException
        See Also:
        SV

      • setSharedAnimationInfoEnabled

        public void setSharedAnimationInfoEnabled(boolean enabled)
        /** Enable or disable animation information sharing between animations in the animation set. You can enable the sharing of animation information such as interpolator type, duration, repeat count, offset, auto reverse can be shared among all the animations belonging to the animation set. This function enables sharing of the animation information across all the animations belonging to the animation set.

        The sharing is disabled by default.

        When the sharing is false. it considers the added animation as a box and then applies its own properties on top of the Box.

        Parameters:
        enabled - :- Set to true to enable animation information sharing, set to false to disable animation information sharing

      • isSharedAnimationInfoEnabled

        public boolean isSharedAnimationInfoEnabled()
        Check if animation information sharing is enabled.
        Returns:
        true, if animation information sharing is enabled, false Otherwise.
